issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Base UI => Views => Scroll View => Basic

there are two buttons (one at the top and one at the bottom). if you click the top button (which adds a view to the scroll view), the bottom button disappears.

{html}
fields.summary: Scroll View - click button - other button disappears

comments.body:
{html}

Turns out the button was specified to be placed, relative to the bottom, so it was sliding behind the added view.

{html}
